SELECT DRV_ID, b.COMP_NM, ATTACH_ID, a.COMP_ID, DRV_NM, DRV_ENM, CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(a.PHONE, HEX(SHA2('TRACOM', 512))) USING UTF8) PHONE, BUS_DIV, DATE_FORMAT(EPLY_DATE1, '%Y%m%d') EPLY_DATE1, CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(LIC_NO, HEX(SHA2('TRACOM', 512))) USING UTF8) LIC_NO, DATE_FORMAT(CERTI_DT, '%Y%m%d') CERTI_DT, EPLY_YN, DATE_FORMAT(RETIRE_DT, '%Y%m%d') RETIRE_DT, a.REMARK
FROM BMS_DRV_MST a, BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST b WHERE a.COMP_ID = b.COMP_ID
AND (DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
select DRV_ID, DRV_NM, b.COMP_NM from BMS_DRV_MST a, BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST b where a.COMP_ID = b.COMP_ID order by DRV_NM

SELECT COMP_ID, COMP_NM FROM BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST
AND COMP_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND COMP_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
